dcterms:creator: M. Cheng
K. Cai
M. Li
dcterms:description: RWF-2000 is the largest dataset on violence detection containing 2000 real-life surveillance footage. Each video is a 5-second clip with various resolutions and a framerate of 30 fps. The videos have diverse backgrounds and lighting conditions.
dcterms:title: RWF-2000

dcterms:creator: E. B. Nievas
O. D. Suarez
G. B. García
R. Sukthankar
dcterms:description: Hockey dataset contains 1000 videos collected from different footage of ice hockey. Each video has 50 frames. All the videos have similar backgrounds and violent actions.
dcterms:title: Hockey

dcterms:creator: E. B. Nievas
O. D. Suarez
G. B. García
R. Sukthankar
dcterms:description: Movies dataset is a relatively smaller dataset containing 200 video clips with various resolutions. The videos are diverse in content, with the 'violent' label collected from different movie clips.
dcterms:title: Movies
